snippet: Mayor Bill de Blasio added a few promising proposals to his list at the State of the City address.
abstract: Editorial reviews New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio's first State of the City address, noting promising proposals related to increasing city's minimum wage, establishing living wage rules and government-issued ID cards; holds that speech nonetheless favored high-flown rhetoric over policy detail.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Bill de Blasio added a few promising proposals to his list at the State of the City address.

headline.main: The State of Mr. de Blasio’s City
headline.print_headline: The State of Mr. de Blasio’s City
